name: Two or more disabilities
text: §657-15  Two or more disabilities.  Where there are two or more such disabilities existing at the time the right of action accrued, the limitations herein prescribed shall not attach until all the disabilities are removed. [CC 1859, §1047; RL 1925, §2650; RL 1935, §3921; RL 1945, §10432; RL 1955, §241-14; HRS §657-15]
